phases.name: Critical User-Facing Text
phases.description: High-priority strings that users see frequently

items.text: Configure intelligent ticket assignment rules and system settings
Create your first assignment rule to automate ticket distribution
Trigger rebalancing when utilization exceeds this percentage
When enabled, the system will automatically redistribute tickets when agents become overloaded
Configure agent expertise levels for categories and subcategories
Manage ticket categories and subcategories with advanced features
Receive notifications when tickets exceed SLA deadlines
Receive notifications when tickets approach SLA deadlines
How often to receive SLA breach summaries instead of individual notifications
Minimum number of breaches to trigger a summary notification
Which ticket priorities to include in notifications
SLA checks run every 2 hours to identify breaches and warnings
Duplicate notifications are prevented - you won't get spammed for the same breach
Agents get immediate notifications, admins get summaries to reduce noise
Summary notifications group multiple breaches into a single, actionable message
Click "Apply Configuration" to activate the new settings
Either extend the session or let it automatically log you out
Teste os toasts básicos para verificar se o Sonner está funcionando
Verifique o sininho de notificações 🔔 no topo da página
As notificações devem aparecer como toasts E no sininho
Your feedback helps us improve our documentation and create better resources for everyone
Find answers to common questions and learn from our comprehensive guides
As notificações são geradas automaticamente com mensagens contextualizadas
Cada tipo de notificação tem uma mensagem específica e apropriada
As mensagens incluem informações relevantes como número do chamado e nomes
As notificações aparecem em tempo real no sino de notificações
Teste diferentes tipos de notificações para verificar mensagens e comportamento
Selecione um tipo de notificação para ver a pré-visualização
Create tasks to track progress and collaborate with team members
A avaliação estará disponível quando o chamado for resolvido
Sua conta foi criada no Sistema de Gestão de Chamados da
View and manage open and in-progress tickets assigned to all agents
Track all updates, improvements, and fixes to the Analy-Ticket system
Ferramentas para debug e teste do sistema de notificações
Use the camera button on your avatar for advanced editing features
Configure automatic logout settings for user sessions
Notify manager when rule is triggered
How much current workload affects assignment
How much past performance affects assignment
How much availability status affects assignment
Maximum tickets an agent can handle simultaneously
Configure custom form fields for this subcategory
Monitor and manage agent workload distribution
Wait for the warning dialog to appear

phases.name: Feedback and Status
phases.description: Error messages, status text, and user feedback
